meanings.definition: A type of clay used for making pottery.
meanings.sent1: The potter shaped the argil into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: The art class used argil to create unique sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The argil decided to become a vase instead of a plate.
meanings.sent4: Her hands molded the argil as if it were a piece of art coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The argil felt cool and smooth under the potter's fingers.

meanings.definition: A type of clay used for making bricks.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers used argil to build sturdy walls.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization relied on argil for their brick structures.
meanings.sent3: The argil bricks played hide and seek with the builders.
meanings.sent4: The argil bricks stood strong against the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The sun baked the argil bricks until they were hard as rock.

meanings.definition: A type of clay used for making tiles.
meanings.sent1: The roof was covered with argil tiles to keep the rain out.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen floor was adorned with shiny argil tiles.
meanings.sent3: The argil tiles danced on the roof during the storm.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity turned the argil tiles into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The argil tiles gleamed in the sunlight, brightening the room.
